attributes.action: Renegotiate all PFI / PPP deals involving RBS / HBOS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Royal Bank of Scotland and HBOS funded hundreds of PFI / PPP projects and are making hundreds of millions of pounds at taxpayers expense even in the midst of this current crisis.

I petetion the government as the controlling shareholder of RBS and as a major shareholder as HBOS to revisit all the deals entered into by the government and these banks and the commercial terms revised to taxpayer advantage.
